text: Bosnia and Herzegovina were first at the 1992 Summer Olympics. Independence from Yugoslavia was in 1991. No athletes have won a medal. The Olympic Committee of Bosnia and Herzegovina was formed in 1992 and recognized in 1993. ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes ==References== == Other websites == * Bosnia and Herzegovina profile at London2012.com Category:Sport in Bosnia and Herzegovina Category:Nations at the Olympics
title: Bosnia and Herzegovina at the Olympics
